mapper.select: select * from t_file_object_share where is_delete = 0 and sign_key = #{key}

select s.*, f.file_name, f.file_size, bk.buckets_name from t_file_object_share as s join t_file_object as f on f.id = s.file_object_id join t_buckets as bk on bk.id = f.buckets_id where s.is_delete = 0 and s.sign_key = #{key}
